price: 89. Mpe Zakariya, tango abelelaki Nkolo wa ye, Nkolo wa ngai kotika ngai moko te, mpe ya sólo, ozali malamu ya bakitanisi.
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā idh nādā rabbahu rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa-anta khayru al-wārithīna
